title: Scott Adams vs. Sam Harris and Jordan Peterson vs. Matt Dillahunty
description:
Why no one wins. Husserl and CS Lewis can help. 

Scott Adams comments on Harris criticizing him https://youtu.be/PQyKLMJdhJM 

Mark Thorsby's helpful treatment of Phenomenology https://youtu.be/UadQmhRFyzs
